newsitem.title: USA: Cytec to build BZT plant in Netherlands.
newsitem.headline: Cytec to build BZT plant in Netherlands.

text.p: Cytec Industries Inc said Wednesday its Dutch subsidiary, Cytec Industries BV, will double production capacity of the specialty chemical BZT by building a new plant at its Botlek facility.
Cytec currently manufactures BZT at its Willow Island, W.Va., facility.
The additional capacity of 2.0 million pounds annually is expected to be on line during the second quarter of 1998.
BZT light stabilizers are used in automotive coatings and plastics.

"Global demand for our products is beginning to exceed our ability to meet customer needs. This expansion will increase our ability to serve customers globally," said David Lilley, president and chief operating officer of Cytec.
The Botlek plant manufactures a wide range of specialty chemicals.
